name: The Cave of Magic DX
description:
This is a "DX" (deluxe) version of The Cave of Magic , a single puzzle text adventure game.

This version features new graphics by Ricardo Oyón (128 x 40 pixels).

Players are invited to remix this game, in the Adventuron CaveJam competition (ends September 15th 2019). Source code for the game (excluding images) is supplied as part of the jam.

This game was written using Adventuron Classroom, read more here.
